titleStmt.title: His Majesties finall ansvver concerning Episcopacie. Delivered in to the commissioners of Parliament the first of Novemb. 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Best, dwelling at Grayes-inne gate,

notesStmt.note: The verso of leaf A1 contains an engraving of the royal seal.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
